name: MatrixOptions
summary: Simplified rendering options for 2D matrices (Data Matrix, PDF417).

properties.name: WebpQuality
properties.summary: WebP quality (0..100). A value of 100 uses lossless VP8L.

properties.name: IcoSizes
properties.summary: ICO output sizes in pixels (1..256). Defaults to common icon sizes.

properties.name: IcoPreserveAspectRatio
properties.summary: When true, preserves aspect ratio and pads to square for ICO.

properties.name: HtmlEmailSafeTable
properties.summary: When true, renders HTML using email-safe tables.
